nodes.text: Fi Yona and the Hyper-Gazers was a band active during the High Republic Era. The band performed at the Republic Fair on the planet Valo shortly before the event was attacked by Nihil marauders. The Kuranu inventor Mantessa Chekkat had hoped to hear Fi Yona and the Hyper-Gazers play, but was unable to, having peviously been imprisoned within a holding cell in the Lonisa City Detention Center.
